select a.*,b.main_lec_subject from (select * from lecture_notice where t_id=#t_id# and lec_n_type=#lec_n_type#
main_lec_code=#main_lec_code#
lec_n_regdate > sysdate-2
lec_n_subject like '%'||#searchValue#||'%'
lec_n_content like '%'||#searchValue#||'%'
order by lec_n_type desc,lec_n_regdate desc) a,main_lecture b where a.main_lec_code=b.main_lec_code
select a.*,b.main_lec_subject from (select * from lecture_notice where lec_n_num=#lec_n_num# order by lec_n_type desc,lec_n_regdate desc) a,main_lecture b where a.main_lec_code=b.main_lec_code
select lec_n_file from lecture_notice where lec_n_num=#lec_n_num#

select a.*,b.main_lec_subject from (select * from lecture_notice where main_lec_code=#main_lec_code# and lec_n_type=#lec_n_type# order by lec_n_type desc,lec_n_regdate desc) a,main_lecture b where a.main_lec_code=b.main_lec_code
